## hpr4023 :: Information Transparency for world peace

 I do not know what if any kind of licence I need or where to find
one. I made this myself while a little tipsy, and if I hadn't been I
would have been too nervous to do so. What can I say it was xmas day and
i was feeling lonely.
All material in the podcast was thought of as I recorded. Nothing was
planned.
The basis of it came to light after recording it.
